name: Touch Numbers
description:
Touch Numbers

Touch the Numbers
- If you miss it, you lose it!

It's very easy, simple, but difficult.

It's easy and simple.
-> Just touch the numbers.

It's difficult.
-> The numbers appear more and more.
-> The time is limited.

Touch the numbers on screen as many as that numbers within a limited time.

1 -> Touch the Number One Time!
2 -> Touch the Number Two Times!
3 -> Touch the Number Three Times!
                             ・
                             ・
                             ・
